guaranteeTerms.name: Availability
guaranteeTerms.definition: 5GTANGO Service Platform will use commercially reasonable efforts to make the offered Network Services available with Availability of at least 99.95%. SLA service level of 99.95% NS availability gives the period of approximately downtime/unavailability of 43s daily. In the event any of the included Network Services do not meet the service level, the SLA is violated.

In the event any of the included Network Services do not meet the service level, the SLA is violated.

guaranteeTerms.name: Availability
guaranteeTerms.definition: 5GTANGO Service Platform will use commercially reasonable efforts to make the offered Network Services available with Availability of at least 95%. In the event any of the included Network Services do not meet the service level, the SLA is violated.
